articles.description: A stunning win at Lord's. An epic chase at Trent Bridge. Now another memorably bold display by Jonny Bairstow and England at Headingley.
articles.content:
When new managing director Rob Key told England fans last month to "buckle up and get ready for the ride", surely not even he could have expected this.
